Welcome to the 13-week TOEFL prep course. Throughout the coming weeks, you will become very familiar with the TOEFL exam, and you will enter the test feeling prepared.

The goal for this course is to help you score above a 95 on the TOAFL exam. To achieve this, we will work on each section of the TOEFL to get the following scores in each section:
